cast.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookies, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewellers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
cast.title: Snatch

details.biography: Based in London, Eric has acted in many feature films including Woman in Gold, A Hologram for the King and Snatch. He is a world class narrator for documentary films and series. His credits include I Shouldn't Be Alive and NOVA (PBS). For animation Eric was pleased to narrate an episode of the iconic South Park (I Should Have Never Gone Ziplining).
details.name: Eric Meyers
